advanced.text: Returns advanced voice information such as underlying model versions when set to true.

voice_uuid.text: UUID of the voice to fetch

meta.description: This endpoint retrieves a voice.

consent.text: A base-64 encoded Wavefile string containing your consent and authorization to create and clone a voice. Please see the Voice Consent section for more details.

voice_type.text: The type of voice to create. Either rapid or professional. If not provided defaults to professional

namdataset_urle.text: A URL to a dataset on which to train the voice on. Please see here for acceptable dataset formats

callback_uri.text: A URL (webhook) that will be notified upon voice training completion Please see here for callback details

meta.description: This endpoint creates a voice and optionally starts training

fill.text: Defaulted to false. If true, the Resemble Fill model will be trained.

meta.description: This endpoint builds a voice. The voice must have at least 30 active recordings. To upload recordings for a voice, see the documentation for the recording resource.

prompt.text: Text description of the voice to create

callback_uri.text: A URL (webhook) that will be notified upon voice generation completion

meta.description: This endpoint creates a voice from a text prompt description. It generates three different voice samples matching your description.

voice_uuid.text: UUID of the voice to delete
UUID of the voice to delete

meta.description: This endpoint deletes a voice.

url.text: The URL of the audio file to be analyzed for deepfake detection. The audio file should be in WAV format. Provide a valid HTTPS URL pointing to the audio file.

callback_url.text: A URL to sent the results to when analysis is completed.

meta.description: Submit an audio file for deepfake detection.
Retrieve the deepfake detection result using the provided UUID.

url.text: The URL of the audio file to be watermarked. The audio file should be in WAV format. Provide a valid HTTPS URL pointing to the audio file.

meta.description: Apply a watermark to an audio file using the provided URL.

url.text: The URL of the audio file to be watermarked. The audio file should be in WAV format. Provide a valid HTTPS URL pointing to the audio file.

meta.description: Detect a watermark in an audio file using the provided URL.

body.text: An array of strings where each string is content to be synthesized (this can be raw text or ssml) or an array of arrays where each element in the nested array conforms to the shape of ['title', ssml']. Max size of each element in the batch is 3,000 characters excluding ssml tags. Max size of the array is 1,000.

voice_uuid.text: UUID of the voice to use for synthesizing

callback_uri.text: The URL to POST the result of the batch to.

precision.text: The audio bit depth of generated audio

sample_rate.text: The sample rate (Hz) of the generated audio

output_format.text: The format of the generated audio

suggestions.text: Whether to apply substitutions and phonemes configured through the dashboard
